title: Acuhope Acupuncture
cleaned_text: acupuncture and herbal treatment for San Fernando Valley and the surrounding areas since 2001. Acupuncture is safe and effective for the treatment of many different types of diseases. The concept of our treatment are based on the Traditional Chinese medicine and integrated with the current Western Medical knowledge. Our treatment methods are from the Yellow Emperor's Classic combined to results of modern studies and our long time experiences of practice. We treat many difficult diseases and a variety of illness: allergy, immune disorder, anxiety, depression, digestive disorders, reproductive problems, menopausal syndromes, inflammatory conditions, skin conditions and pain. Our patients are came from different professionals include medical doctors, nurses, chiropractors, podiatrists, acupuncturist, pharmacists, social workers, attorneys, judges, teachers, workers and retired persons. We pledge to you our dedication to top quality medical excellence. We provide gentle loving holistic care for our patients and treat them as a person, a fan, not
